SlideBody.Heading: Security Policies: CheckLoadURI
SlideBody.BodyText: Local data needs special protection - pages from the Web must be blocked from loading or linking to local data.
SlideBody.SourceCode: Remote content (http, ftp, mail, etc) cannot load or link to local content (file, chrome, about, local mail).
SlideBody.BodyText:
This policy applies to SCRIPT tags, links, stylesheets, form submission, frames, etc. In short, almost anywhere a URL appears in Web content.
The CheckLoadURI policy compares schemes only; it does not look at hosts.
